last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Inventions include a mount for smartphones and tablets, a device that attaches to armrests to extend personal space, holistic soap for women, vegan soap, toy building bricks, and a picture-hanging tool.

name: Steve Harvey's Funderdome
overview: The inimitable Steve Harvey is hosting a new, groundbreaking show on ABC, Steve Harvey's Funderdome looking for great innovators and entrepreneurs to help fund their American dream. We're looking for mom and pop businesses, unique and interesting products, or creative ideas that just need a little more money to jumpstart their next phase. You could win anywhere from $10,000 - $100,000, all you have to do is win over the live studio audience and convince them that you deserve to be funded.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Inventions include a mount for smartphones and tablets, a device that attaches to armrests to extend personal space, holistic soap for women, vegan soap, toy building bricks, and a picture-hanging tool.
